H0.text: Which pop legend recently topped the album charts with The Next Day ? His first number one since 1993.. David Bowie

H1.text: Which pop legend recently topped the album charts with The Next Day ? His first number one since 1993.. Elton John

H2.text: Which pop legend recently topped the album charts with The Next Day ? His first number one since 1993.. Madonna

H3.text: Which pop legend recently topped the album charts with The Next Day ? His first number one since 1993.. Bowiean

A4.text: Debuting at number one on the UK Albums Chart, The Next Day was his first album to top the chart since Black Tie White Noise, and was the fastest-selling album of 2013 at the time.

A5.text: The single topped the UK iTunes Chart within hours, and debuted in the UK Singles Chart at number six, his first single to enter the Top 10 for two decades (since 'Jump They Say' in 1993).
